document_data.mainbody:
Hammerstaad was a Northlander city on the island of Giantspine in Norheim in the Moonshae Isles.
The city was located on the southern end of the island on an unnamed natural bay just west of Northwind Strait.
Hammerstaad was the seat of power for the king of Norheim. The city was protected by the nearby fortress where the king and his family lived.
